Detailed Description

Basic reference counted object class, intended for use with AngelScript.

Author:
Jack Owen Shelton Framework used in both my CS 3520 and CS 4322 projects.
Date:
Spring 2009 Classes that need to be created and destroyed in AngelScript but treated as reference objects should inherit from this class.
